divs: Sighting Detailsme and my wife margarett was driving hwy 99 freeway we merged on to i-80 towards reno nv as i start to merge to the left i see out of the corner of my eyes to my left a very shiny silver cigar shaped flying craft it appeared appox 100 to 125 ft long i could not believe my eyes, i was so surprised to see this object flying across the freeway, at first i thought it was a airplane but it did not have any wings nor a wing tail, at that time i yelled to my wife who was on my cell phone talking to our account in elk grove ca, i told her to look up and i pointed to it she only saw it for a split second it was flying too low to be a commerical airliner or too large to be a private jet ,it was moving left to right at a very fast rate of speed but slow enough to see it clearly it did not appear to have any windows nor did it have any decals or markings on it as soon as it passed over the freeway it made a very sharp left towards the reno area and was gone in less than two seconds i hope someone else saw this today i have never seen any thing like this in my life and i would not make a false claim i do believe now we are not alone, im a god fearing family man with 3 kids who now think im crazy thank you for your time if you wish to contact me please do .
Summary: Driving down Hwy I-80 towards Reno I saw what looked like a very large silver cigar shaped craft.
trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Elk Grove
There were no other sightings in Elk Grove on or around July 19th 2010
